title: Epicor webinar: Experts share strategies for successful ERP implementation in India’s SME landscape
description: Sunil Jain, President and Executive Director of Rajoo Engineers Limited, Biren Parikh, CIO of Symphony Limited, and Vishal Raj Saini, Country Head – India and Indian Subcontinent at Epicor Software participated in the third episode of the EconomicTimes.com x Epicor webinar series. Here are the highlights.
